summary: A set of reusable helper modules that support the LiteLLM proxy layer, offering functions for admin UI generation, callback handling, debugging, encryption/decryption, HTTP request parsing, remote configuration loading, OpenAIâ€‘compatible endpoint sanitization, and Swagger/OpenAPI error schema definition.
business_intent: Enable the LiteLLM proxy to operate securely and efficiently by centralizing common tasks such as configuration management, request validation, sensitive data handling, diagnostics, and API documentation, thereby reducing duplication and simplifying maintenance.
